mapper.select: SELECT question.ques_id, article.article_id, article.type, article.title, article.photo_url, article.content, article.author_id, article.anonymity, article.comment_num, article.report_num, article.create_time, users.`name` FROM question JOIN article ON question.ques_id = article.ques_id JOIN users ON article.author_id = users.user_id WHERE izhihu.question.ques_id = #{quesId}

SELECT users.`name`, question.ques_id, question.questioner_id, question.ques_name, question.ques_describe, question.photo_url, question.answer_num, question.attention_num, question.browse_num, question.anonymity, question.create_time, question.update_time FROM question JOIN users ON question.questioner_id = users.user_id WHERE izhihu.question.del = 0 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5
SELECT question.* FROM question WHERE del = 0 ORDER BY question.browse_num DESC
SELECT question.* FROM question WHERE del = 0 and ( ques_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ques_describe like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
